class_notes: Registration for this class is only for students in the Transactional Certificate Program. DO NOT TRY TO ENROLL IF YOU DID NOT RECEIVE A SPECIFIC ENROLLMENT WINDOW!
prerequisites: Business Associations, Contract Drafting, and Deal Skills are pre-requisites for this course. If you have not satisfied all courses, then you are not eligible to enroll at this time. Please contact Kelli.Pittman@emory.edu with all inquiries.
